messages.subject: Unschooling dream
messages.msgSnippet: I enjoyed the discussion (mine included) about negative dreams of high school on this list. So of course I had an unschooling dream last night, never had one
messages.messageBody:
I enjoyed the discussion (mine included) about negative dreams of high school
on this list. So of course I had an unschooling dream last night, never had
one of those before!

My mother, my daughter, and I were at some convention with tables and
displays. There was a special room/display that you could add to the art with
your own personal contribution.

I was trying my damnedest to write something on the wall. It was like a
chalkboard, but my writing wouldn't stay on and it was too light. So I tried
a crayon, and it wasn't legible.

I was trying to write "Quit school and Get a Life. Unschooling.com"

It was more frustrating than being naked at high school ROFL.......

Ang
Unschooling mom to
Megan(10) Ashlyn(3) Christian(1.5)
<A HREF="http://hometown.aol.com/unolist/index.html">UNO Unschoolers Network of Ohio</A>
<A HREF="http://hometown.aol.com/unolist/hometour3.html">**new**Ang's Virtual Home Tour Part 3</A> (the homeschooling room)
<A HREF="http://members.aol.com/megamom08/page1.html">My Links Page MEGAMOM08</A>


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
